Purpose: Add For 2019 Fall Picnic in Carbon County News on September 4, 2019

Expenditure Paid Communications Subject: Announcement of Carbon County Republican Fall Picnic.  "Carbon County Republicans will  be hosting a fall picnic at the Lyon's Park Gazebo in Red Lodge on Sunday September 8, beginning at 1:00 PM.  Sloppy Joes  and non alcoholic beverages will be provided.  The picnic is free and attendees are encouraged to  bring a dessert or salad, potluck style."
